name: Bear Adventures 2
description:
You are a bear ... Beekeeper! Your enemies have decided to destroy your honey empire!
Go on an interesting journey! Death traps await you on your way to the castle,
and hungry crocodiles floating in the castle sewers will not miss the opportunity to dine with you.
Overcome all trials and return the stolen honey in order to restore your production!
The game has interesting locations: on the river, in a beautiful autumn forest, in a castle, as well as other exciting levels!
-attack with a "turntable" blow
-Use ingenuity to pass traps
-Kill wild wolves and other animals.
-Pass levels for a while, compete with your friends!
